contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=February 2012}} {{infobox shopping mall | | shopping_mall_name = Bucureşti Mall | image = Bucharest mall christmas.jpg | caption = | location = [[Bucharest]], [[Romania]] | opening_date = 1999 | developer = | owner = Anchor Group | number_of_stores = 140 | number_of_anchors = | floor_area = {{convert|38000|m2|sqft|abbr=on}}<ref>[http://www.zf.ro/proprietati/ce-directie-vor-lua-banii-de-cumparaturi-ai-bucurestenilor-odata-cu-deschiderea-sun-plaza-5471302/ Shopping Malls in Bucharest] {{Ro icon}}</ref> | floors = 5 | parking = 2,000 underground & deck }} The '''Bucureşti Mall''' is a [[shopping mall]] located in [[Bucharest]], [[Romania]], close to the [[Dudești, Bucharest|Dudeşti]] and [[Văcărești, Bucharest|Văcăreşti]] neighbourhoods. At the time of its completion it was the first shopping mall in Romania.<ref>[http://www.zf.ro/companii/directorul-operational-al-centrelor-comerciale-bucuresti-mall-si-plaza-romania-a-plecat-din-grupul-anchor-dupa-11-ani-7758416 Bucureşti Mall and Plaza România] {{Ro icon}}</ref> Located on Calea Vitan approximately 1 km outside Bucharest's historic center, the four-story, 50,000 m² mall opened in 1999, in a [[Nicolae Ceauşescu|Ceauşescu]]-era abandoned [[hunger circus]], or giant food warehouse, in an area largely shaped during the [[Communist Romania|Communist period]] (''see [[Ceaușima]]''). ==Gallery== <gallery> <!-- Image with unknown copyright status removed: Image:Bucuresti_Mall_photo_by_Nimrod_Kamer_01.png| |<center>Main hall, October 2006</center> {{deletable image-caption|1={{subst:#time:l, j F Y| + 7 days}}}} --> Image:Bucharest mall- beauty shop.photo by dan69en.jpg |<center>Beauty shop</center> Image:Bucharest mall photo by dan69en.jpg |<center> Main hall, December 2006</center> Image:Bucuresti_Mall_photo_by_Nimrod_Kamer_02.jpg |<center> CD store, October 2006</center> </gallery> ==External links== *[http://www.bucurestimall.com.ro/index.php?chlang=en Bucureşti Mall: Official site] ==References== <references/> {{Shopping malls in Bucharest}} {{coord|44|25|13.04|N|26|7|35.53|E|display=title}} [[Category:Shopping malls in Bucharest]] {{mall-stub}} {{romania-struct-stub}}
